name: Beyond the Best
description:
This game is Trick Style Action Game.

As you run through the stage, use "Right Stick" to make tricks.

The score multiplier increases as tricks continue.

Key map:
 Y button  :Jump
 Left Stick :Running
 Right Stick:Trick on Jumping
 
Caution:
 This app will play audio from startup

・Windows App
・Need Xbox Controller

Creaters:

　Nao-T（ナオティ）

　Ichi(いち）

　Okaken（オカケン）

　CAT（きゃっと）

　Ryo（りょう）
